product_name: Goal Zero Rock Out 2 Solar Portable Speaker
long_description: For the adventurous audiophile, a Goal Zero Rock Out 2 Solar Speaker in your backpack ensures the music will continue, no matter how far you roam from home. Features a DarkBass chamber, one-touch Bluetooth(R) wireless coupling and powerful built-in solar panel. Internal battery has a 20+ hour runtime. USB recharge time: 2 hours. Built-in solar recharge time: 8 hours. Advanced Bluetooth controls. Rugged waterproof outer shell is built to withstand the elements.
short_description: For the adventurous audiophile, a Goal Zero Rock Out 2 Solar Speaker in your backpack ensures the music will continue, no matter how far you roam from home.
